nodes.text: Larall was a female Human who served as a lieutenant in the Republic Army during the Cold War and Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Lieutenant Larall was stationed aboard the Galactic Republic space station Carrick Station.

Lieutenant Larall appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, where she is located on Carrick Station. She delivers rewards to players of the Trooper class at the end of their Act I and Act II storylines.
